name: Wooly Sheep Shave: The Shepherd Shaving Lamb Day for Wool Harvest - Free
name_original: Wooly Sheep Shave: The Shepherd Shaving Lamb Day for Wool Harvest - Free
description:
TRY OUR WOOLY SHEEP SHAVE : THE SHEPHERD SHAVING LAMB DAY FOR WOOL HARVEST GAME

In this game, you have to shave the wooly sheep by the razor. Make them clean but try to avoid birds while you shave.

Oh don't forget to collect coins on your way to unlock new razors. This is the most entertaining game.

How to play?

- Control the razor during the shave
- Avoid the birds
- Collect coins to unlock new razors

INSTALL NOW >>> WOOLY SHEEP SHAVE : THE SHEPHERD SHAVING LAMB DAY FOR WOOL HARVEST GAME

Send us your most welcome comments!
